pages.disclaimers: PetalsExpress - Disclaimers and Terms of Service PetalsExpress HOME ABOUT US Product Contact BUY NOW PetalsExpress Disclaimers By using the PetalsExpress website and services, you agree to the following disclaimers: Product Information We strive to provide accurate information on our products. However, we cannot guarantee that all information is completely error-free. We reserve the right to change product information at any time without prior notice. Availability We cannot guarantee the availability of all products at all times. Product availability may change due to factors beyond our control. Pricing Prices listed on our website are subject to change without notice. We will make every effort to ensure prices are accurate, but errors may occur. Colors We strive to display product colors as accurately as possible on our website. However, due to variations in monitor settings, the colors you see may not be an exact representation of the actual product. Delivery We will use reasonable efforts to deliver your order within the estimated timeframe. However, we cannot guarantee delivery times, and delays may occur due to unforeseen circumstances. The PetalsExpress website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. pages.privacy-policy: PetalsExpress - Privacy Policy PetalsExpress HOME ABOUT US Product Contact BUY NOW PetalsExpress Privacy Policy This Privacy Policy describes how PetalsExpress collects, uses, and discloses your personal information when you use our website and services. Information We Collect We collect several types of information from you, including: Personal information such as your name, email address, shipping address, and billing address. Information about your order history and preferences. Device information such as your IP address, browser type, and operating system. How We Use Your Information We use your information for various purposes, including: To process your orders and deliver your flowers. To send you marketing communications, such as newsletters and promotional offers. To personalize your experience on our website. To improve our website and services. The PetalsExpress website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. pages.terms-conditions: PetalsExpress - Terms and Conditions for Ordering Fresh Flowers Online PetalsExpress HOME ABOUT US Product Contact BUY NOW PetalsExpress Terms and Conditions Welcome to PetalsExpress! These Terms and Conditions ("Terms") govern your use of our website and services. By using our website, you agree to be bound by these Terms. Eligibility You must be at least 18 years old to use our website and services. By using our website, you represent and warrant that you are at least 18 years old and of legal capacity to enter into a binding contract. Orders All orders placed through our website are subject to acceptance by PetalsExpress. We reserve the right to refuse any order for any reason. You agree to provide accurate and complete information when placing an order. This includes your name, shipping address, billing address, and payment information. Payment We accept various payment methods as listed on our website. You agree to pay for all orders placed through our website. Delivery We will use reasonable efforts to deliver your order within the estimated timeframe. However, we cannot guarantee delivery times, and delays may occur due to unforeseen circumstances. You are responsible for any shipping costs associated with your order. Return Policy [Insert details about your return policy, including the timeframe for returns, conditions for accepted returns, and refund process] Intellectual Property The content of our website, including text, graphics, logos, and trademarks, is the property of PetalsExpress or its licensors. You may not use any of our intellectual property without our written permission. Termination We may terminate your access to our website and services for any reason, at any time, without notice. The PetalsExpress website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline.
